mainSequence.step: Customer Manager selects option to edit a job opening
System requests to input a job reference
System shows Job Opening details and asks Customer Manager if they want to update the description
System asks Customer Manager if they want to update the address
System asks Customer Manager if they want to update the Mode
System asks Customer Manager if they want to update the Contract Type
System asks Customer Manager if they want to update the job title
System asks Customer Manager if they want to update the number of vacancies
System requests Customer Manager for new values to update
System displays updated Job Opening and shows operation success
